short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Up-to-date news aggregated from thousands of blogs, newspapers, and magazines around the Web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the latest news and follow the coverage of breaking news events, local news, national and global politics, and more from the world's top trusted media outlets. News Hound is elegant, simple, fast, and more importantly it does not get in your way.
